dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1375 IH: To amend the Small Business Act with respect to the maximum additional loan amount for certain disaster loans, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Castor of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act with respect to the maximum additional loan amount for certain disaster loans, and for other purposes.

section.header: Maximum additional loan amount for certain disaster loans
section.text: Section 7(b)(1)(A) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(b)(1)(A)) is amended by striking 20 per centum and inserting 30 percent.
